about_the_game:
Play as Nur, a child of a powerful empire who was blessed with the power to transform into a dragon. After setting out to explore beyond the borders of her civilization, she discovers a strange and beautiful new land that has been infected with a dark corruption.

Soar is a game about freedom, where the open sky is your canvas. You can sail through the clouds at a relaxing pace, seeing where the wind takes you- or you can blaze a path across the skies, experiencing the exhilaration of speed. You can lean into the experience, bringing Soar to the forefront as you get into a flow state, or you can let it fade into the background while you let your mind wander. Did you have a stressful day at school or work? Try weaving between the floating islands at breakneck speed, setting a new record in a time trial. Listening to a podcast and need some more stimulation? You can glide across the landscape, taking in the sights of one of Tasneem's varied biomes. Soar is designed to fit into the gaps of your life- wholesome and aesthetic, it's easy to enjoy for a wide audience of gamers and viewers.

Keep an eye out for Soar: Pillars of Tasneem- coming soon!

KEY FEATURES

  • Transform into a dragon and experience the joy of flight

  • Explore a large and vibrant open world, full of activities and mysteries

  • Unique, meditative vibes
